column4: Can anyone tell me how to burn an Audio CD with minimal effort from a bunch of mp3s, Ideal process would be like WMP10 (Open App > Add mp3s > select burn/before burning takes place the files are converted to wav for use in everyday cd players... Please tell me this is possible??

If you're having problems opening certain files make sure you have the GStreamer plugins needed to decode them. I think I have just about every pulgin ever created installed which do I need to get Serpentine to work properly
